movie.title: Clown
movie.description_intro: A group of teens fights for their lives as they find themselves trapped in a fun-house, stalked by a killer clown who won't rest until every last one of them is dead.
movie.description_full: A group of teens fights for their lives as they find themselves trapped in a fun-house, stalked by a killer clown who won't rest until every last one of them is dead.

movies.title: Vampz!
movies.summary: A wanna-be vampire must team up with her ditsy, new roommate and a crazed vampire hunter to thwart an unexpected enemy's despicable schemes.
movies.description_full: A wanna-be vampire must team up with her ditsy, new roommate and a crazed vampire hunter to thwart an unexpected enemy's despicable schemes.
movies.synopsis: A wanna-be vampire must team up with her ditsy, new roommate and a crazed vampire hunter to thwart an unexpected enemy's despicable schemes.

movies.title: Home with a View of the Monster
movies.title_english: Home with a View of the Monster
movies.title_long: Home with a View of the Monster (2019)
movies.summary: Dennis and Rita arrive home to a series of mysterious events.
movies.description_full: Dennis and Rita arrive home to a series of mysterious events.
movies.synopsis: Dennis and Rita arrive home to a series of mysterious events.

movies.title: Death by 1000 Cuts
movies.summary: Death by 1000 cuts refers to an ancient method of torture in which numerous small cuts were made on a victim's body. None of the cuts were deadly by themselves, but the combination of them would cause them to die a slow, painful death. In psychology, it refers to small issues that are overlooked until they add up to something too big to ignore. Sometimes I question which version of the phrase is worse.

movies.title: The Last Horror Film
movies.summary: Vinny is obsessed with famous actress Jana Bates and is determined to have her star in his movie. He travels to the Cannes Film Festival in France to try and convince her. Unfortunately, he goes about things in a rather unprofessional manner and people invloved with Jana Bates begin to disappear.
